text: The Biosafety Level 4 Zoonotic Laboratory Network is an international consortium of Biosafety Level 4 research laboratories. Its members are * National Centre for Foreign Animal Disease (Canada) * National Bio and Agro- Defense Facility (United States) * Pirbright Institute (United Kingdom) * Friedrich Loeffler Institute (Germany) * CSIRO Australian Animal Health Laboratory (Australia) ==References== Category:Biosafety level 4 laboratories Category:Veterinary research institutes
title: Biosafety Level 4 Zoonotic Laboratory Network
